author.description: The author of this content or rating. Please note that author is special in that HTML 5 provides a special mechanism for indicating authorship via the rel tag. That is equivalent to this and may be used interchangeably.

downvoteCount.description: The number of down votes this answer has received from the community.

upvoteCount.description: The number of upvotes this question, answer or comment has received from the community.

text.description: The textual content of this awnser, derived from the [CreativeWork]

answerExplanation.description: A step-by-step or full explanation about Answer. Can outline how this Answer was achieved or contain more broad clarification or statement about it.
